headline: Is It Too Late To Consider McKesson After A 46% Surge In 2025?
summary: If you are wondering whether McKesson still looks attractive after its strong run, or whether much of the potential upside is already reflected in the price, this article will walk through what the current share price really implies. The stock has climbed 46.0% year to date and 43.3% over the last year, even after a recent 5.0% pullback over the past month that followed a 2.5% gain in the last week. Investor attention has been supported by ongoing strength in McKesson's pharmaceutical...
